Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Ahh come on! A child could have done it! At least you tried your best, scrub. HAHAHA.
啊，没搞错吧！就算是个小孩也能做到！至少你尽力了，小学生。啊哈哈哈。
"scrub" is gamer terminology for a bad player.
击败太空掠夺者的敌人

Filthy freeloaders have taken up space near one of our camps. We’ve tried all kinds of diplomacy to get rid of them; violence, non-stop verbal abuse, stealing, harassment, but nothing seems to work! Might even have to ask nicely! Send them a love letter from us, and wipe them off the face of the planet.
肮脏的不速之客占据了我们一个营地附近的区域。我们采取了各种“外交”政策想要除掉他们，暴力、不停的口头谩骂、偷窃、骚扰，可没有一个办法管用！看来我们只能好言相劝了！给他们发一封情书过去，然后让他们从这个星球上彻底消失。
"freeloader" is someone who is lazy and gets things for free.
Hell yeah! You gave those scumbags a proper pasting. We appreciate the help. We may even be startin' to like ya. Take this; we’re sure you’ll find use for it. See ya around.
哦耶！那些渣滓得到了惨痛的教训。我们感谢你的帮助，甚至开始有点喜欢你了。拿着，今后肯定会派上用场。下次再见。
Refers to gamers going on raids with friends in World of Warcraft.
So you want to join our guild? Show us you are serious about raiding. Our boys will be spectating, so put on a show!
所以说，你想要加入我们公会？那就让我们看看你冒险时的态度。我们的人都看着呢，秀起来！
Nice one! Our boys were getting bored stiff, but you got their blood pumpin’. Here is a token of their appreciation.
很不错！我们的人本来都快无聊死了，但你让他们血脉喷张。为了表示感谢，这枚代币是他们给你的。
"Nex" or "Black Nex" is a drug in the Planetfall universe.
击败太空掠夺者的敌人
Some renegades stole a cache of Black Nex belonging to the clan. Filthy vermin, the cheek of them! Give ‘em a good ganking for us and you’ll receive payment for your services.
一些叛徒偷走了一批属于帮派的黑死药。卑鄙的渣滓，厚颜无耻的混蛋！好好教训他们一顿，你会得到奖励的。
Nice one, gov'nor! Talk about getting rekt. That’s what we like to see!
漂亮，总督！简直就是碾压。这正是我们想看到的！
"Gib" refers to giblets. Gamer terminology to blow someone up into fleshy pieces.

One of our guilds is getting blown to gibs by these cheaters! They must be hacking reality or something - they’re so OP. I bet your clan can match them though. Rek them proper good, and we’ll share some valuable loot we’ve been holding on to.
我们的一个公会被这些作弊者给轰成了碎片！他们肯定是开挂了或是用了别的什么手段，他们太强了。我想你的帮派应该能与他们抗衡。碾碎他们，我们将与你分享一些十分珍贵的战利品。
"guilds" refers to gamer guilds. "OP" gamer terminology for over powered. "'Rek" refers to getting "rekt". See above.

One of our guilds is getting blown to gibs by these cheaters! They must be hacking reality or something, they’re so OP. I bet your clan can match them though. Rek them proper good, and we’ll share some valuable loot we’ve been holding on to.
You’re the real deal. You really gibbed those freeloaders hard, and given us some peace of mind. Here, you deserve this, gov’nor!
可真有你的，你真的狠狠地教训了那些不速之客，这下我们可以稍微安点心了。拿着，总督，这是你应得的！

What’s wrong with this instance? They keep on coming. Must be a glitch. They’ve got these long, nasty claws and teeth like razors. Tore poor old Damien’s leg right off - he bled out all over the place. Put them down and burn the nest and you’ll be paid in turn. Squash these bugs!
这是怎么回事？它们源源不断地涌来。肯定是出毛病了。它们长着又长又吓人的爪子，牙齿跟剃刀一样锋利。把可怜的老达米安的腿都给扯下来了，他的血流得到处都是。干掉这些怪物，烧毁它们的巢穴，你将得到奖赏。压扁这些臭虫！
Impressive. Our boys couldn’t put a scratch on those vermin, but your lads sent ‘em back to the Cosmic Dark Age. Here, have some loot!
真是了不起。我们的人想对这些虫子造成伤害都够呛，你那些家伙却把它们打回到了宇宙黑暗时代。来，拿些战利品走！
"Cosmic Dark Age" refers to the dark age of the Planetfall universe.
"Raid" refers to players going on raids in World of Warcraft.

The Great Preacher has declared a great raid crusade against the pirates frustrating our business. You can join our raid if you like, smash a few heads in! The rats just keep coming from somewhere. Find the source and set fire to the hole they crawl from.
大教士向阻挠我们生意发展的海盗发起了一次规模宏大的伟大远征。如果你有意向的话，可以加入我们，敲碎几个人的脑袋！这些鼠辈不知道是从什么地方冒出来的，无穷无尽。找到他们的源头，一把火烧了他们的老巢。
Burned to a crisp, gotta love that smell! Oh right, your reward. Come raid again soon!
烧得嘎嘣脆，味道肯定很好闻！噢，对了，这是你的奖励。欢迎下次再来！
A play on two words, "virtual" and "reality"
Build the Dreamscape Stations for the Spacers
为太空掠夺者建造梦幻之境

We’ve been unplugged from Dreamscape for too long. Now we just have the stories from the Preachers. We crave Dreamscape badly; all the guts, the glory, but without the mess of real life. If you could build us some Dreamscape stations, we’ll pay well for it.
我们脱离梦幻之境很久了，如今我们从教士那里听说了一些消息。我们真的十分渴望回到梦幻之境，那里充满了勇气和荣耀，能够摆脱现实世界的困扰。如果你能帮助我们建造梦幻之境，我们会好好奖励你的。
Woah, these sims are great! You’ve done us a great service. GGWP.
哇哦，这些模拟简直太棒了！你帮了我们大忙，GGWP。
"GGWP" is gamer terminology for "good game, well played".
Simulation was the reality of these Union people, now known as the Spacers.
虚拟世界曾经是这些星际联盟人类的现实，如今他们被称为太空掠夺者。
Produce Vehicle Parts for the Spacers
为太空掠夺者制造载具零件

In Dreamscape, our machines were patched up in no time. But our real-life wrecks are wearing out fast and vehicle loot is diminishing. Could your factories help crank out some brand new hardware for our next raid?
在梦幻之境里，我们的机器很快就能修好。但在现实世界中，我们的东西很快就用光了，载具战利品也在减少。你的工厂能否帮助我们制造一些全新的硬件，以供我们下次作战时使用？
Wohohoo, these wheels are on fire! Thanks!
哇哦哦哦，这些轮子简直酷毙了！感谢！
The Spacers have been unplugged from Dreamscape since the fall of the Union, and reality is their new struggle. Developing their own hardware and being self-sufficient is difficult for the Spacers.
自从星际联盟陨落以来，太空掠夺者就脱离了梦幻之境，在现实世界中开始了新的摸爬滚打生活。让他们自己开发硬件并且自给自足是一件困难之事。
Back to Life, Back to Reality
Reference to the song by Soul II Soul.
Research Reality Rehabilitation for the Spacers
为太空掠夺者研究“现实复兴”

Our past virtual lives haunt us in this reality. Can’t think straight, can’t concentrate. Too much violence in our heads. It isn’t right. We need help, rehab or somethin’. Help us make us right again.
我们过去虚拟的生活与如今的现实纠缠不清，我们没法清晰地思考，也没法集中精神，暴力充斥在我们的脑海里。这是不对的，我们需要帮助，康复计划或者什么的。帮助我们的生活走上正轨。
We won’t forget this, Outlander. You’ve saved a lot of our guild because of this. We’ve got your back. Here, take this.
我们不会忘记此好，拓荒者。公会中的许多人因你得救，我们会支持你的。请收下奖励。
"Outlander" refers to the informal title given to the player by the Spacers. Could be male or female.
Unplugging from Dreamscape has turned the Spacers' world upside down and left them broken.
从梦幻之境中脱离出来使太空掠夺者的世界发生了天翻地覆的变化，他们都处于支离破碎的状态。
Research Sustainable Economics for the Spacers
为太空掠夺者研究可持续经济
Raids will only sustain us for so long. Even our veteran warriors know this. We need learn to able to craft our own stuff. Will you teach us?
即使是老兵也知道，四处掠夺也只能为我们的生活支撑那么一阵子。我们得学习制造自己的东西，你能教教我们吗？
Thank you, this will help us leave the Dark Age behind. Have this.
感谢你，这将帮助我们摆脱黑暗时代。收下这一奖励。
"Dark Age" refers to the Cosmic Dark Age of the Star Union.
For the Spacers to thrive on their own, they must learn to become economically stable.
太空掠夺者要想自给自足、繁荣发展，必须先学会维持稳定的经济来源。
制作一顿灵能水母大餐

So our elite gaming celebs have developed an appetite for Psi-Fish. Problem is that they often fight back, and we can’t afford to lose our best gamers. I’ll send you the cooking streams, so you’ll know just how to prep them. Naturally, you’ll need to hunt down some Psi-Fish and butcher them. We’ve picked out the perfect specimens.
我们的精英游戏大佬喜欢吃灵能水母，问题是这些生物经常还击，我们不能失去我们最好的玩家。我会发给你几个烹饪直播，这样你就能知道如何准备它们了。当然，你需要去抓几只灵能水母回来杀掉。我们已经选出了最好的样本。
Delicious work, {STR_LeaderName}. You should host your own cooking stream. I’d subscribe to it!
真是美味，{STR_LeaderName}。你应该自己开一个烹饪直播，我肯定会来订阅的！
Destroy the Submarine Base for the Spacers
帮助太空掠夺者摧毁潜艇基地

Our Junk Ships keep getting hit by broken records. Our last shipment of fry sauce was blown. They act like they’re Star Union before everything went FUBAR. Blow up the Submarine Base before something else goes FUBAR.
我们的垃圾船一直不停地遭到攻击，最后一批装着酱汁的货物也被炸毁了。他们就像是一切灾难发生之前的星际联盟一样。趁着其他东西还没被破坏，炸毁那个潜艇基地。
FUBAR is an abbreviation of "fucked up beyond all repair".
Nice. You sunk them boats, and you gotta love things that go boom. Especially on the water. Fire. Water. It’s like the circle of life. Here’s your game cred.
漂亮。你击毁了他们的船只，你会爱上爆炸的感觉的，尤其是当它发生在水上的时候。火和水，就像是生命的循环。这是你应得的游戏积分。
改进太空掠夺者的建筑结构。
We need some foundations built for our clan strongholds - the ground is turning to sand beneath our feet! Will you help reinforce our structures? Otherwise the lads will be buried before too long.
我们脚下的土地正在变成沙子，我们得为帮派要塞建造一些地基！你能帮助我们加固我们的建筑吗？否则的话要不了多久这些家伙就会被埋入土里了。
Now our buildings won’t keep fallin' over! It’s about time! I hate moving house every time the place collapses. Here, your loot box!
现在我们的建筑不会倒塌了！早就应该这样做了！我讨厌每当一个地方塌陷时就必须搬家的感觉。拿着，这是你的战利品箱子！
The Spacers barely know how to architecturally develop and construct buildings of high quality. At least with solid foundations, their buildings won't keep collapsing.
太空掠夺者几乎不知道如何建造高质量的房屋。有了坚实的地基后，至少他们的建筑就不会总是倒塌了。
针对太空掠夺者的疾病进行医学研究
Help us, gov’nor! The clan has taken sick and we don’t know what to do! Mike has weird blisters all over his body... well, more than usual anyway. Please, help us find a cure for these skin bubbles!
帮帮我们，总督！帮派的人都生病了，我们不知道怎么办才好！迈克的全身都长着奇怪的水泡…呃，不管怎么说比平时还要多就是了。请帮助我们找到治疗皮肤水泡的解药！
The bubbles on Mike are gone! How’d you do that?! You a Techno Prophet or somethin’? Whatever, here’s your reward! Thanks again.
迈克身上的水泡消失了！你怎么做到的？！难道你是科技先知之类的人吗？算了，这是你的奖励！再次感谢。
太空掠夺者皮肤病的解药
The Spacers don't have access to modern medicine and struggle to treat illness and disease. Help them develop a cure.
太空掠夺者没有现代医学的支持，面对疾病他们很是苦恼。帮助他们研发解药。
A "Boss Rush" is a gaming reference to playing against all bosses in a video game at the same time.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
打败太空掠夺者的大首领
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

You wanna be king of the hill, you gotta take on the big boss. C’mon, we believe in you! Never mind all the camera-drones… we ain’t getting our thrills… just finish him! Prove yourself to us. That’s how you earn game cred around here.
如果你想成为山中之王，你就得去挑战大首领。来吧，我们相信你！别去管那些摄像无人机了，我们不会感到兴奋的…去干掉他就行了！向我们证明自己，这样你才可以赢得游戏积分。
"game cred" refers to an in-game currency. "C'mon" short for come one.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Ouch. I’m not at all sore about betting against ya. You got serious game. You’ve proven you’ve got more skill than just buying a bunch of fancy skins. Here’s your winnings.
哎哟，虽然你让我赌输了，但也不是一无所获。你的确很有本事。你证明了你的技术，而不只是会买一堆漂亮的皮肤。这是你的奖励。
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
"Fun Police" refers to people that want to stop other people having fun.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Destroy Autonom Protection Patrol for Spacers
为太空掠夺者消灭自主机械保护巡逻队
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

Every time we go partying in the Elysium Parks, we get hounded by these good for nothing losers! They say we’re too hard on the androids. Could you do us a favor and send them back to the Dark Age? Preferably in pieces. We’ve got some loot stored back at the guild, it’s yours if you help.
每次我们去极乐公园参加派对时，都会被这些一无是处的失败者纠缠！它们说我们对机器人太苛刻了。你能帮我们一个忙，把它们送回黑暗时代吗？最好是大卸八块的那种。我们的公会里储存了一些战利品，如果你能帮忙的话，那些就是你的奖励了。
"Elysium Parks" refers to an in-game sector. "Dark Age" refers to a time period in the game world. "Guild" refers to a gamer clan, gamer terminology.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Finally, we can enjoy the E:Bots in peace! All the Autonom are good for is scrap. Maybe their large domes could hold popcorn. Good job, Gov’nor. Here’s your reward.
我们终于可以不被打扰地享受 E:Bot 了！所有的自主机械都是好的废料。也许他们的大罩子可以用来装爆米花。干得好，总督。这是你的奖励。
"E:Bots" are in-game units. "Gov'nor", reffering to governer. Can be male or female.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Destroy the Spacer’s failed attempt to build a Petting Zoo
消灭太空掠夺者建立儿童动物园失败时的产物
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

Um… so you’re big and tough, right? We thought it’d be a good idea to—you know—make a petting zoo. We get these urges, and well the animals look so… touchable. But Dingo got his arm ripped off, and something swooped down and snatched up Bait-Master. Now they’re breeding faster than we can keep track. Could you destroy it? I’m sure it’s not that dangerous.
嗯…你看上去又高又壮，不是吗？我们觉得，嗯，你懂的，建一个儿童动物园是个好主意。我们有了这种的冲动，而那些动物看起来是那么的…软萌。但是丁戈的手臂被扯掉了，还有什么东西俯冲下来抓住了诱饵大师。现在我们记录的速度甚至已经赶不上它们繁殖的速度了。你能摧毁它吗？我敢肯定它并没有那么危险。
"Dingo" is the name of a random Spacer, male. "Bait-Master" refers to a Spacer who is the masrter of baits.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Heh. Thanks for clearing that… um… awkwardness… up. Here’s a little token of our appreciation.
嗨！谢谢你帮我们解决了…呃…那堆麻烦。这是我们一点小小的心意，感谢你。
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.

The Spacers are the uncivilized faction of the Star Union. They are heavily influenced by Mad Max films and speak very informally, aggressive, uneducated, lower-class.
It is important to recognize the use of "gamer terminology" and very heavy use of slang.
